events.message: I am reporting a car accident that occurred yesterday afternoon involving my vehicle and another on Main Street.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and photographs submitted.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle this auto accident claim and will contact the claimant soon.
We have received and acknowledged your claim regarding the vehicle collision and will keep you updated.
Please submit your vehicle registration, photos of the collision damage, and the police report for review.
All requested documents including vehicle photos and official police report were submitted through the online portal.
Our claims investigation team has started reviewing the submitted materials for this auto accident claim.
The investigation into the vehicle collision is complete; findings were documented and forwarded for assessment.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on damage estimates and liability determination for your review.
The claimant acknowledged receipt of the settlement proposal and requested clarifications on certain coverage details.
Your auto accident claim was approved officially, confirming the extent of coverage and amount payable.
The approved payment for vehicle repairs has been issued and should be credited to your bank account shortly.
This auto accident claim is now officially closed following successful payment and claimant confirmation.
All documentation and communications related to this claim have been archived for future reference.
